channel.title: Help
channel.description: I want to learn how to make a rs private server from scratch like make a source so i dont have too download a source. Basically i want to make a server like write a script code it blah blah so i can make it the way i want to. Can anyone explain to me how or show me how i know people do it i just wanna know how.

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @mclovinscape mclovinscape
item.description:
@mclovinscape wrote:

Trust me…it would be hard to make your own source, why not use a blank one?

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @warlok warlok
item.description:
@warlok wrote:

Yeah, pretty much. Try not to leech though, if you’re going to make a source, make it unique.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @homestar9 homestar9
item.description:
@homestar9 wrote:

ohhhhhh, so i should look at a sources content and build off my own in like notepad or something and compile that all together and then add different parts

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @warlok warlok
item.description:
@warlok wrote:

Not copying, no. Study the makeup of server framework (RS2DV, Hyperion) and build off of it, in your own way, of course.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @homestar9 homestar9
item.description:
@homestar9 wrote:

So basically i need to study different areas of sources and build my own through what they use? like downloading one and copying and modifying what they use in their scripts to create my own source.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @warlok warlok
item.description:
@warlok wrote:

There’s no point looking for instruction on creating a server from scratch, you’re better off studying stable released bases and building one similar.

Read full topic
